channel.title: iFriends Preview
channel.description:
I am starting a new webcast. This is a story of 3 friends: a nerd, a dumbass, and a jerk. Laugh out loud fun. I'm the nerd (Arthur). Poor quality (did this on webcam). But we will shoot on professional video camera. I sound gay due to the webcam.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=669m1k7vlSY

item.title: iFriends Preview
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Oh my god, please stop production until your balls drop. I’ve never heard such high-pitched annoying whiny voices as bad as this.

And before I get a warning for this, watch it first >.>

Read full topic

item.title: iFriends Preview
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

Steps to not sucking that hard:

  1. Use a good camera

  2. Use a tripod

  3. Use a good microphone

  4. Use effects but not to heavily

  5. Make a story line

  6. Make a green screen and use that and other 3d objects, then edit them in Adobe * That one program thingy to use green screens

  7. Keep them new

  8. Make your own website and video player

  9. Dont skimp on money, if you need something for a video get it

  10. Tell Booooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooobby [b]he[b] is gay.

PM for epic halp

Read full topic
